title: Lag client
body: When I was logged in, my client took a few minutes to log me in. Sometimes when I go to my profile, it took a few minutes to load my stats. And when I queued up for a ranked, my client froze in champion select. Later in champ select, I hover over nami and locked her, but the chat read that all the other players left as I had no more time left to select my champion. I tried again to see if the problem is fixed, but as soon as I got into champ select, the client froze, and I could not ban a champion.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble all around accessing the variety of different services from the authentication server to the game server.  I recommend sticking to custom games for now to prevent any penalties, and go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
